original_title: Murder City Devils: Rock & Roll Won't Wait
overview: An inside look at a year in the life, on and off the road, of one of Seattle's most notorious bands, The Murder City Devils. Featuring live performances, rare glimpses backstage, and scores of interviews with the band, their fans, and their families. Also includes the videos for 18 Wheels and Bunkhouse.
title: Murder City Devils: Rock & Roll Won't Wait
